description:
In publishing and graphic design, Lorem ipsum is a placeholder text commonly used to
        demonstrate the visual form of a document or a typeface without relying on meaningful
        content. Lorem ipsum may be used as a placeholder before the final copy is available. It is
        also used to temporarily replace text in a process called greeking, which allows designers
        to consider the form of a webpage or publication, without the meaning of the text
        influencing the design. Lorem ipsum is typically a corrupted version of De finibus bonorum
        et malorum, a 1st-century BC text by the Roman statesman and philosopher Cicero, with words
        altered, added, and removed to make it nonsensical and improper Latin. The first two words
        themselves are a truncation of dolorem ipsum ("pain itself"). Versions of the Lorem ipsum
        text have been used in typesetting at least since the 1960s, when it was popularized by
        advertisements for Letraset transfer sheets. Lorem ipsum was introduced to the digital world
        in the mid-1980s, when Aldus employed it in graphic and word-processing templates for its
        desktop publishing program PageMaker
